entry.title: https://github.com/CliMA/ClimaAtmos.jl
entry.content: ClimaAtmos.jl is a library for building atmospheric circulation models that is designed from the outset to leverage data assimilation and machine learning tools. We welcome contributions!

entry.title: https://github.com/CliMA/Oceananigans.jl
entry.content: ðŸŒŠ Julia software for fast, friendly, flexible, ocean-flavored fluid dynamics on CPUs and GPUs

entry.title: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General
entry.content: The official registry of general Julia packages

entry.title: https://github.com/Jutho/TensorKit.jl
entry.content: A Julia package for large-scale tensor computations, with a hint of category theory

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerSimulations.jl
entry.content: Julia for optimization simulation and modeling of PowerSystems. Part of the Scalable Integrated Infrastructure Planning Initiative at the National Renewable Energy Lab.

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/ModelingToolkit.jl
entry.content: An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/NonlinearSolve.jl
entry.content: High-performance and differentiation-enabled nonlinear solvers (Newton methods), bracketed rootfinding (bisection, Falsi), with sparsity and Newton-Krylov support.

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
entry.content: High performance ordinary differential equation (ODE) and differential-algebraic equation (DAE) solvers, including neural ordinary differential equations (neural ODEs) and scientific machine learning (SciML)
